CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Workstop_Issue__c) != null && Workstop_Issue_Cleared__c==false,'0 - HOLD', IF(((Deal_Phase__c == 'Closed/Won') || (Deal_Phase__c == 'Closed Won')) && InvoiceRequested__c==false ,'10 - Ship / Invoice' , IF(((Deal_Phase__c == 'Closed/Won') || (Deal_Phase__c == 'Closed Won') || (Deal_Phase__c == 'Closed Lost')) && Revenue_Recognized__c == true,'12 - DONE' , IF(TEXT(Revenue_Recognition_Expected__c) != null && Revenue_Recognized__c==false && InvoiceRequested__c==true,'20 - Revenue Recognition Hold', IF(((Deal_Phase__c == 'Closed/Won') || (Deal_Phase__c == 'Closed Won')) && InvoiceRequested__c==true ,'12 - DONE', IF(TEXT(Data_Shipped_ECM__c ) != null ,'11 - Request Invoice', IF(TEXT (License_Signed_Lic_CoE__c) != null,'10 - Ship / Invoice', IF(TEXT(License_Back_From_Customer__c) !=null,'09 - Lic CoE Signature', IF(TEXT(License_to_Customer__c) != null,'08 - Customer', IF(Final_Review__c == true,'07 - Send to Customer', IF(TEXT(License_Review_Issue__c) != null,'06.5 - Review Issue' , IF(Account_manager_review__c == true,'06 - Final Review', IF(Engineer_Manager_Review__c == true,'05 - Acct manager license review', IF(LicenseDraft__c == true && Record_Data_Owner__c !=null,'04 - Appendix Review', IF(LicenseDraft__c == true && BusinessContact__c !=null,'05 - Acct manager license review', IF(WorkbookComplete__c == true,'03 - Draft License', IF(TEXT(PO_Received__c) != null,'02 - Acct manager workbook','01 - Acct manager negotiating')))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Process Step
